issue.title: Wall of warnings in a souce build

content.raw:
`Wshadow` (usually implies brittle code but it seems to be present in generated code), and `Wunused-parameter` might be resolved by modifying the default compiler flags used.

`Wdeprecated-copy`, `Wpessimizing-move` are valid converns. It helps me to think that `std::move` doesn't perform a move, it performs a cast instead.
content.html:
Wshadow (usually implies brittle code but it seems to be present in generated code), and Wunused-parameter might be resolved by modifying the default compiler flags used.

Wdeprecated-copy, Wpessimizing-move are valid converns. It helps me to think that std::move doesn't perform a move, it performs a cast instead.
